Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in the Fordham Road business improvement district, extension of the Fordham Road business improvement district, and amending the district plan of the Fordham Road business improvement district to change the method of assessment upon which the district charge is based.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
